name: Project Pandora
description:
Project Pandora is a 2D platformer where the player, trapped in the Vault (a gigantic complex manufacturing high technology weapons and traps) after its closure 500 years ago, tries to escape with Pandora, a shapeshifting weapon !

This project is actually my first game, and took a lot more time that expected. I still had a ton of fun developing it, even though some problems persisted. Please be patient, and judge it as what it is: an amateur project ! Have fun !
